item.title: Australian Mental Health Systems Models Zenodo Community
item.description: To facilitate the sharing of model code by the Australian mental health modelling community, Acumen curates an open access code repository. The code repository is the Australian Mental Health Systems Models Zenodo Community. Linked to this repository is Acumen’s GitHub organisation. Currently our GitHub organisation is just used to host the source code for this website, but over time we aim to use it to share brief code snippets that may not be appropriate for archiving in our Zenodo repository.
